WARNING TO NEW READERS:
Major trigger warning: RA** (Do not read this story if r@pe triggers you, especially between the main characters)

Spoiler!
Trigger: R@pe between the main couple, the rough and painful sort of r@pe. It's a drug influenced incident, and it carries on for two whole chapters.

Seriously, if this scenario would upset you, stop here. I wish someone would have warned me. This story is so wonderful and perfect in season 1 so naturally you get super attached, which makes the incident only that much worse. The r@pe only happens in season 2, and it comes out of nowhere, for no fuc**** reason. And it's just totally fine afterwards, like nothing happened. Cuz of course r@pe is totally normal and fine, every fuc**** bl has to include it. I really thought this one would be an exception cuz their relationship was getting all healthy and greenflaggy, even in the sea of redflag that is everything else in their lives. But noooooo. Author decided r@pe should enter their relationship, so fU** us, right? readers who don't think r@pe is se** don't count. Right? Fu** I'm really mad right now, sorry
